info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 3 at 9:21PM CDT until April 8 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee...
North Fork of the Forked Deer at Dyersburg
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Tennessee...
South Fork of the Forked Deer at Jackson
South Fork of the Forked Deer near Halls
For the North Fork Forked Deer River...including Dyersburg...Minor flooding is forecast. For the South Fork Forked Deer River...including Jackson, Halls... Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...South Fork of the Forked Deer at Jackson.
* WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 37.0 feet, Riverside Drive between Jackson and Bemis is closed.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 34.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 PM CDT Thursday was 34.5 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 35.9 feet tomorrow morning and will eventually rise to 37.0 feet Sunday evening. Pay close attention to subsequent forecasts as multiple days of rain will impact the crest and duration of the flooding. - Flood stage is 34.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING
